diff_act: 1.ensure messages are delivered in a reliable manner
2.maintain the order in which messages are sent

regen.new_specification: Communication services shall provide message broadcasting services to virtual groups to ensure messages are delivered to all intended recipients.
Communication services shall provide message broadcasting services to virtual groups to facilitate communication among multiple subsystems.
Communication services shall support broadcasting messages to virtual groups.

label: Communication services shall provide the capability to broadcast messages to all virtual groups.
